task.title: Task
task.closeAndStart: Close task and start a new one
task.delete: Delete Task (Shift + Click to skip confirmation)
task.shareWithOrganizationDescription: Only members of your organization can access
task.sharePubliclyDescription: Anyone with the link can access
task.connectToCloudDescription: Sign in to WeCoder Cloud to share tasks

about: Generate, refactor, and debug code with AI assistance. Check out our <DocsLink>documentation</DocsLink> to learn more.
onboarding: Your task list in this workspace is empty.

boomerangTasks.title: Task Orchestration
boomerangTasks.description: Split tasks into smaller, manageable parts

stickyModels.title: Sticky Models
stickyModels.description: Each mode remembers your last used model

tools.title: Tools
tools.description: Allow the AI to solve problems by browsing the web, running commands, and more

customizableModes.title: Customizable Modes
customizableModes.description: Specialized personas with their own behaviors and assigned models

modeSelector.title: Modes
modeSelector.description: Specialized personas that tailor WeCoder's behavior.

enhancePromptDescription: The 'Enhance Prompt' button helps improve your prompt by providing additional context, clarification, or rephrasing. Try typing a prompt in here and clicking the button again to see how it works.
addContext: @ to add context, / to switch modes
dragFiles: hold shift to drag in files
dragFilesImages: hold shift to drag in files/images

checkpoint.initializingWarning: Still initializing checkpoint... If this takes too long, you can disable checkpoints in <settingsLink>settings</settingsLink> and restart your task.

menu.restoreFilesDescription: Restores your project's files back to a snapshot taken at this point.
menu.restoreFilesAndTaskDescription: Restores your project's files back to a snapshot taken at this point and deletes all messages after this point.

instructions.wantsToFetch: WeCoder wants to fetch detailed instructions to assist with the current task

fileOperations.wantsToRead: WeCoder wants to read this file:
fileOperations.wantsToReadMultiple: WeCoder wants to read multiple files:
fileOperations.wantsToReadAndXMore: WeCoder wants to read this file and {{count}} more:
fileOperations.wantsToReadOutsideWorkspace: WeCoder wants to read this file outside of the workspace:
fileOperations.wantsToEdit: WeCoder wants to edit this file:
fileOperations.wantsToEditOutsideWorkspace: WeCoder wants to edit this file outside of the workspace:
fileOperations.wantsToEditProtected: WeCoder wants to edit a protected configuration file:
fileOperations.wantsToApplyBatchChanges: WeCoder wants to apply changes to multiple files:
fileOperations.wantsToCreate: WeCoder wants to create a new file:
fileOperations.wantsToSearchReplace: WeCoder wants to search and replace in this file:
fileOperations.didSearchReplace: WeCoder performed search and replace on this file:
fileOperations.wantsToInsert: WeCoder wants to insert content into this file:
fileOperations.wantsToInsertWithLineNumber: WeCoder wants to insert content into this file at line {{lineNumber}}:
fileOperations.wantsToInsertAtEnd: WeCoder wants to append content to the end of this file:

directoryOperations.wantsToViewTopLevel: WeCoder wants to view the top level files in this directory:
directoryOperations.didViewTopLevel: WeCoder viewed the top level files in this directory:
directoryOperations.wantsToViewTopLevelOutsideWorkspace: WeCoder wants to view the top level files in this directory (outside workspace):
directoryOperations.didViewTopLevelOutsideWorkspace: WeCoder viewed the top level files in this directory (outside workspace):
directoryOperations.wantsToViewRecursive: WeCoder wants to recursively view all files in this directory:
directoryOperations.didViewRecursive: WeCoder recursively viewed all files in this directory:
directoryOperations.wantsToViewRecursiveOutsideWorkspace: WeCoder wants to recursively view all files in this directory (outside workspace):
directoryOperations.didViewRecursiveOutsideWorkspace: WeCoder recursively viewed all files in this directory (outside workspace):
directoryOperations.wantsToViewDefinitions: WeCoder wants to view source code definition names used in this directory:
directoryOperations.didViewDefinitions: WeCoder viewed source code definition names used in this directory:
directoryOperations.wantsToViewDefinitionsOutsideWorkspace: WeCoder wants to view source code definition names used in this directory (outside workspace):
directoryOperations.didViewDefinitionsOutsideWorkspace: WeCoder viewed source code definition names used in this directory (outside workspace):
directoryOperations.wantsToSearch: WeCoder wants to search this directory for {{regex}}:
directoryOperations.wantsToSearchOutsideWorkspace: WeCoder wants to search this directory (outside workspace) for {{regex}}:
directoryOperations.didSearchOutsideWorkspace: WeCoder searched this directory (outside workspace) for {{regex}}:

codebaseSearch.wantsToSearch: WeCoder wants to search the codebase for {{query}}:
codebaseSearch.wantsToSearchWithPath: WeCoder wants to search the codebase for {{query}} in {{path}}:

mcp.wantsToUseTool: WeCoder wants to use a tool on the {{serverName}} MCP server:
mcp.wantsToAccessResource: WeCoder wants to access a resource on the {{serverName}} MCP server:

modes.wantsToSwitch: WeCoder wants to switch to {{mode}} mode
modes.wantsToSwitchWithReason: WeCoder wants to switch to {{mode}} mode because: {{reason}}

subtasks.wantsToCreate: WeCoder wants to create a new subtask in {{mode}} mode:
subtasks.wantsToFinish: WeCoder wants to finish this subtask
subtasks.defaultResult: Please continue to the next task.
subtasks.completionInstructions: Subtask completed! You can review the results and suggest any corrections or next steps. If everything looks good, confirm to return the result to the parent task.

powershell.issues: It seems like you're having Windows PowerShell issues, please see this

autoApprove.title: Auto-approve:
autoApprove.description: Auto-approve allows WeCoder to perform actions without asking for permission. Only enable for actions you fully trust. More detailed configuration available in <settingsLink>Settings</settingsLink>.
autoApprove.selectOptionsFirst: Select at least one option below to enable auto-approval

announcement.title: 🎉 WeCoder {{version}} Released
announcement.description: WeCoder {{version}} brings powerful new features and significant improvements to enhance your development workflow.
announcement.feature1: <bold>Codebase Indexing Graduated from Experimental</bold>: Full codebase indexing is now stable and ready for production use with improved search and context understanding.
announcement.feature2: <bold>New Todo List Feature</bold>: Keep your tasks on track with integrated todo management that helps you stay organized and focused on your development goals.
announcement.detailsDiscussLinks: Get more details and discuss in <discordLink>Discord</discordLink> and <redditLink>Reddit</redditLink> 🚀

followUpSuggest.copyToInput: Copy to input (same as shift + click)

browser.rooWantsToUse: WeCoder wants to use the browser:

systemPromptWarning: WARNING: Custom system prompt override active. This can severely break functionality and cause unpredictable behavior.
profileViolationWarning: The current profile isn't compatible with your organization's settings

shellIntegration.title: Command Execution Warning
shellIntegration.description: Your command is being executed without VSCode terminal shell integration. To suppress this warning you can disable shell integration in the Terminal section of the WeCoder settings or troubleshoot VSCode terminal integration using the link below.
shellIntegration.troubleshooting: Click here for shell integration documentation.

autoApprovedRequestLimitReached.title: Auto-Approved Request Limit Reached
autoApprovedRequestLimitReached.description: WeCoder has reached the auto-approved limit of {{count}} API request(s). Would you like to reset the count and proceed with the task?

versionIndicator.ariaLabel: Version {{version}} - Click to view release notes
